FuncDef:
The lpt oam-period command configures an OAM detection period for an LPT instance.
The undo lpt oam-period command restores the default OAM detection period for an LPT instance.
By default, the OAM detection period is 10 for an LPT instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets an OAM detection period for an LPT instance.
The value is an integer ranging from 10 to 100, in 100 milliseconds. The step is 1.

ExtraInfo: To configure an OAM detection period for an LPT instance, run the lpt oam-period command. This period is carried in sent packets, and the peer timeout period is three times the OAM detection period.
